author: Russell Brandom
title: We’re still waiting for Trump’s coronavirus testing system
description: It’s been two weeks since the president promised a Google website to solve the US testing crisis — but we still don’t have a testing system, and the coronavirus testing crisis has only gotten worse.
content:
Its been two weeks since the president promised that a Google project would solve the US testing crisis
President Trump declares a national emergency in the Rose Garden on March 13th, 2020.
Photo by Yasin Ozturk / Anadolu Agency via Getty Images
